 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָמוֺת‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** only plural ==death== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמוֺתֵי תַחֲלֻאִים‎</span> [[Jer.16.4|Jer 16:4]] of painful ***death by diseases***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָלָל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Ezek.28.3|Ezek 28:3]]. — For <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּמוֺתִים‎</span> ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]]) [[2Kgs.11.2|2Kgs 11:2]], ***the slain***, [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּוּמָתִים‎</span> is certainly correct (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּת‎</span> **Hoph\`al** above)
